blog.name: gay4groundzero
blog.title: King Explosion Murder’s #3 fan
blog.description:
(his #1 fan is Deku, his #2 fan is Kirishima)

I’ll be so sad if his hero name isn’t Ground Zero lmao

PLEASE DON’T SPOIL THE MANGA FOR ME! I JUST STARTED READING!!!

I'm Andrew // 23yrs // he/him

summary:
“he’d be the protagonist” SAYS THE PROTAGONIST
deku really doesn’t give himself enough credit, though. like... Todoroki...
body:
“he’d be the protagonist” SAYS THE PROTAGONIST

deku really doesn’t give himself enough credit, though. like… Todoroki definitely has a Tragic Backstory™

but a kid who has always dreamed of being a pro hero finding out he’s quirkless, then being heroic enough for the top hero to pass on a legendary power so the kid can realistically achieve his dream?? there’s a reason i find Deku so inspiring lmao

this kid gives everyone around him so much credit for supporting him and getting him where he is, he doesn’t stop to realize all that HE’S done to support those same people.

i’m just *clenches fist* so fucking proud of this freckly boy

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Uncrowned
description:
by MissAdams

“I may not be able to fight you with my power alone, but if he’s there with me, I – I can do anything. And I will never forget who I want to be.”

🙟🙝

Prince Todoroki has no desire to run the Kingdom of Yuuei, despite the constant pressure from his father and advisors. But a stable boy on a mission, an age-old curse, and the awakening of a thousand-year prophecy may just change that desire. And maybe change the world as he sees it.

Words: 5527, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto, Iida Tenya, Uraraka Ochako, Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou
  • Relationships: Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Jirou Kyouka/Yaoyorozu Momo
  • Additional Tags: Fantasy AU, Prince and the Pauper, Quirkless Midoriya Izuku, Prince Todoroki Shouto, Adventure, Gay ships lets go, Alternate Universe - Quirks (My Hero Academia), JUST FANTASY AU, Tododeku is pure and good, fight me, i dare you, I’m a Tae Kwon Doe BlAck BelT I DaRe You, Kiribaku is a close second for me, Don’t even hit me with the Todomomo shit it hurts me physically, enjoy, Oh wait, Endeavor is a dick, Mama Rei is pure and lovable. We stan her in this household, fantasy tododeku, Fantasy Kiribaku, Bi Uraraka Ochako, uuuuh, what else man, Pining, shit man, Mutual Pining, shit this book is going to kill me, greek-style fantasy au, UA kingdom, War, Drama, Drama & Romance, Teenage Drama, Angst and Drama, God fucking dammit I’m going insane., Witch Uraraka Ochako, Knight Iida Tenya

blog.name: midoriyas-quirk
blog.title: Days Without A Broken Limb: 0
blog.description: Hold your head up and plunge forward- the world is waiting to see you go! | First Year U.A. student, dating @todorokis-quirk | {asks always open; affilated with @hero-academias-quirk rp group! profile pic by @furanse}

question: ❗
answer:
Your muse sees mine having a nightmare. Send me ‘❗’ to hear something my muse mutters in their sleep.

Pain M!A: 3/5

(Midoriya clutches his arm in pain.)

“Ow!”

(He twitches in his sleep, the pain rushing through his arm signaling to his unconcious brain. He whimpers.)

“No. No, not them. Please. Please, I’ll do anything!”

(He rolls onto his side, tossing and turning.)

“No… no! Iida! Uraraka! Todo…Todoroki!”

(All goes quiet…)

“Mom?”

(Midoriya gets louder and more desperate cries erupt from his mouth.)

“No, no, not her, please, anyone but her!”

(Midoriya wakes suddenly, screaming and crying. The pain in his arm throbs, all he can hear is his heart beating, and he cries, cries in pain and misery, for who he thinks he has lost. Slowly, slowly, his agony comes to a stop as the realisation that it was all a nightmare comes, though the tears of pain don’t end. The never-ending pain in his arm is certainly not a nightmare. As he leans back onto his pillow, he takes a deep, shaky breath and tries to go back to sleep. Within half an hour, the world is the same as before.)

Ask box: Closed

Current requests: 18

Links for mobile users:

✧ Rules ✧ FAQ ✧ Ships ✧ Mod Intros ✧ Masterlist ✧

summary: Could you do something for Vlad King dating Aizawa’s sister?
question: Could you do something for Vlad King dating Aizawa’s sister?
answer:
• It was awkward at first. Vlad King and Aizawa are just coworkers, not really friends, and they don’t really even know each other too well.
  • It actually took a while for Aizawa’s sister to tell Aizawa. She waited until they’d been dating for a month or so to tell him.
  • He was okay with it, for the most part. She can do what she wants.
  • That doesn’t mean he’ll really put any effort into becoming closer with Vlad King, though. Vlad, on the other hand, is willing to get to know Aizawa better through his new S/O.
  • Aizawa’s sister is, overall, glad that they get along, but she wishes they’d really get to know each other more.

Ask box: Closed

✧ Rules ✧ FAQ ✧ Ships ✧ Mod Intros ✧ Masterlist ✧

summary: Kurogiri and Thirteen as siblings and their s/o’s finding out?
question: Kurogiri and Thirteen as siblings and their s/o’s finding out?
answer:
• Kurogiri and Thirteen were close when they were younger, but once they got older they grew apart because of a difference in morals.
  • Kurogiri is older.
  • They also look similar, but because Thirteen wears a costume that hides their appearance barely anyone knows.
  • They didn’t know what the other was doing for a long time. However, Thirteen recognized Kurogiri at USJ.
  • Thirteen told their S/O after they’d recovered from USJ. Kurogiri found out much later, but hid it from his.
  • Thirteen tried to make it clear that they wish they’d stayed closer with Kurogiri, and that they’d helped convince him not to become a villain. Their S/O understands.

  • Thirteen tried to make it clear that they wish they’d stayed closer with Kurogiri, and that they’d helped convince him not to become a villain. Their S/O understands.
trail.content:
• Kurogiri and Thirteen were close when they were younger, but once they got older they grew apart because of a difference in morals.
  • Kurogiri is older.
  • They also look similar, but because Thirteen wears a costume that hides their appearance barely anyone knows.
  • They didn’t know what the other was doing for a long time. However, Thirteen recognized Kurogiri at USJ.
  • Thirteen told their S/O after they’d recovered from USJ. Kurogiri found out much later, but hid it from his.
  • Thirteen tried to make it clear that they wish they’d stayed closer with Kurogiri, and that they’d helped convince him not to become a villain. Their S/O understands.

blog.name: lickitysplitfic
blog.title: lickitysplit fic
blog.description: Writing blog for Lickitysplit. Find me on FFNet and AO3 as Lickitysplit. Main blog @maybeishouldwait. NnT, BNHA, and a bit of other fandoms. 18+

title: Six Sentence Sunday
body:
Untitled new BNHA fic, my first multi-chapter one…

For a moment he stills, and Bakugou looks up, panting. Four of the other heroes are climbing to their feet, one unmoving. He grits his teeth and looks down, ready to take some payback out on the guy for taking out his squad. But he settles instead for pinning his wrists as his walkie-talkie goes off. “We need rescue on the top floor! Hero down, code six.”

“I’m here!” The familiar voice sends a jolt through him, and Bakugou’s eyes snap up. Another hero is navigating the rubble to get to them, and he blinks when she easily lifts a huge piece of the roof and tosses it aside. Her costume is sort of familiar, a green and pink that looks skin tight and accentuates everything underneath. Shaking his head, he listens as she reaches the others who are surrounding the teammate on the ground. He knows her, he knows he does, but how?
